# Frontend Instructions

Stack:

- React
- TypeScript
- Vite
- React Query
- TailwindCSS

## Architecture

- components/
- pages/
- hooks/
- services/
- types/

## Rules

- Keep components small and reusable.
- Move API calls to services/.
- Use React Query for data fetching.
- Avoid logic inside JSX.
- Always type props explicitly.
- Create loading and error states.
